Articles.Content: Hi everyone! I am working on a stock sandbox in KSP, version 1.0.5. OPM has installed but the textures won't load. What is wrong? Thanks guys!

What exactly to you mean when you say, "the textures won't load" ?  Does the game simply not load when you start it?  That could be just Active Texture Manager crunching a bunch of textures, which might take a while.  Or does the game actually start but the new planets have no textures?  In the latter case, I have no idea other than to suggest you try downloading OPM again.
Thanks, the new planets just don't have textures.
If you've got no textures at all, then I'd download the mod again and be double sure you install it per instructions.
Moved to modded support, you could try asking in the OPM thread as well.

5 hours ago, Geschosskopf said:

If you've got no textures at all, then I'd download the mod again and be double sure you install it per instructions.

All this gas giants and planets are pure white.

Reinstalled it, still won't work. Gas giant textures still missing and some moons

 

Edited December 10, 2015 by Kekkie
Forgot the exact problem to add
Hmm, well, I'm afraid I'm out of ideas.  It works for me and I even use aggressive Active Texture Manager.  You might want to ask this question in the OPM thread instead of here.

Okay!!

Wait where is it?

 

Edited December 11, 2015 by Kekkie
Where's the thread?

Reinstalled Kopernicus, still no luck.

But I still want OPM!

How do i do this? Please help, please.

Edited December 11, 2015 by Kekkie
But I still want OPM!

22 hours ago, Kekkie said:

Reinstalled Kopernicus, still no luck.

But I still want OPM!

How do i do this? Please help, please.

Try ckan. I was having the same problem, but ckan seems to get everything working fine.
My computer is a mac sorry
I feel really really desperate. HELP!!!!!!!!!!!!!!

Not sure if this will be helpful, but I was having the same problem. Seemed I installed Kopernicus Expansion along with OPM by accident. When I pulled the mod out of my install, it was fixed. You'll still need normal Kopernicus however.

Edited April 8, 2016 by riskyjubles

I have the planets but there are no moons (excluding Eloo). I RLY NEED HELP SO I CAN ALSO FIX IT ON MY MOD  IN DEVELOPMENT PLS HELP. sry for caps

 

Edited April 11, 2016 by Astronaut #1
I am also having the problemof the planets being white. Also, the only new moon that I have is Eeloo around Sarnus (which is white!). Pls help!

Has anyone got a solution to this problem? I really would like to use OPL and a number of other planet packs, but it seems that some of them have this problem. For example, the New Horizons mod has a few planets with textures, and a few like this, with a slightly different coloration than the ones in OPL. Could it be a problem with Kopernicus or Galactic Neighborhood? I can't think why GN would have an effect, it only rearranges the planets. I posted on the OPL thread but no luck yet.

EDIT: Going into the planet configs to the 

Material
	{
	...
	}

section and removing the .dds extension from the texture and normal map file paths has changed the planets to pure white, like the OP. If anyone else has this problem, that is a good place to start.

Edited June 17, 2016 by ruiluth
